programme.title: Timeless Love
programme.desc: Megan seems to have the perfect life with a wonderful husband named Thomas and 2 adorable children. Then she finds herself awakening from a coma – and discovers she is not and has never been married. But when she meets Thomas for real, she seizes the chance to help him fall in love with her, again—for the first time.

programme.title: The Importance Of Being Mike
programme.desc: Gwen and Doug join Ali on her date with Mike as they go camping in the woods.

programme.title: The Importance Of Being Mike
programme.desc: Mike gets a little too competitive when taking Ali out on a date.

programme.title: How to Find Forever
programme.desc: Marley's brilliant at organizing other people's engagements, but unlucky in finding romance herself. When designing her most important proposal yet, the man who could jeopardize it all may be the one who helps find her own love story.

programme.title: Austentatious
programme.desc: Emma prepares for a date with a very handsome, very successful former client. Grant is jealous and tries to convince Emma this date is too good to be true. Lizzie finds the perfect house for Darcy’s mystery woman. After spending time with Darcy, Lizzie starts to see him in a new light. Elinor tries to figure out how to act around Edward since she knows he’s been flirting with her while having a girlfriend on the side. Edward comes clean that he’s long been involved with someone else, but he really admires Elinor. Elinor is heartbroken.

programme.title: Finding Love in San Antonio
programme.desc: Adela gets an offer to work on a new network series that will send her traveling around Europe, but she worries about moving Fabiola, her daughter who is still homesick for San Antonio.

programme.title: Letters From the Heart
programme.desc: Hope’s Nona passes away, and upon Hopes return to Cherry Valley for the funeral, she learns she is to inherit a large sum of money, with one condition.

programme.title: Love Across Time
programme.desc: While inspecting an old British manor for its real estate potential, Chelsea discovers a portal through time that connects with the late 1700s owner of the property. When an accident occurs, the gentleman comes through and gets stuck in the present day.

programme.title: Passport to Love
programme.desc: Nicole, a successful travel blogger, meets Kade, a marketing rep for a travel publishing company, and they form the beginnings of a relationship while exploring an island destination. They juggle their work traveling around the world while seeing each other again. Both know there’s something special between them, but it will be put to the test when Kade’s competitive boss challenges Kade to thwart Nicole’s business.

programme.title: Timeless Love
programme.desc: Megan seems to have the perfect life with a wonderful husband named Thomas and 2 adorable children. Then she finds herself awakening from a coma – and discovers she is not and has never been married. But when she meets Thomas for real, she seizes the chance to help him fall in love with her, again—for the first time.

programme.title: How to Find Forever
programme.desc: Marley's brilliant at organizing other people's engagements, but unlucky in finding romance herself. When designing her most important proposal yet, the man who could jeopardize it all may be the one who helps find her own love story.

programme.title: Midway to Love
programme.desc: When the network announces that her television therapy show is changing to a tabloid shock-fest, a straight laced and caring psychologist returns to her hometown and reunites with her high school sweetheart while finally realizing that having someone to share a life with is more important than fame and the excitement of the city.

programme.title: Love, Lost & Found
programme.desc: Claire gets a surprise proposal on a mountain hike with her boyfriend Joey but when they get separated, a rancher turns Claire’s head and a park ranger makes Joey see they’re made for each other.

programme.title: Love Switch
programme.desc: On their 13th wedding anniversary, James and Michelle wake up to discover they have somehow switched bodies. Unable to switch back, they are forced to understand what the other goes through daily.

programme.title: Plus One at an Amish Wedding
programme.desc: April Monroe is a superstar doctor at a big New York hospital, who has fallen head-over-heels for charming veterinarian Jesse, and their relationship seems to be heading in the right direction except for one thing: Jesse is completely tight-lipped about his Amish family.

programme.title: Prescription For Love
programme.desc: Claire, a nurse, fights for a chance at love with a charming new doctor and for a promotion to free herself from the misery her supervisor creates. As her supervisor tries to derail Claire's chance at happiness, Claire will have to stand up for herself and go after her dreams.

programme.title: Cinderella in the Caribbean
programme.desc: Ashlyn Vanderbilt travels with her stepmother Miriam and her fiancé Bruce for their destination wedding. Although Ashlyn finds friendship and love with Bruce's son, Noah, she struggles to have her happily ever after when she discovers that her stepfamily plans to ruin Bruce.
